title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: Currently, the report design stores the absolute path of the library include. For example, <property name="fileName" value="E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary"/>. The absolute path is not ideal, and we need to save the relative path instead. Additionally, the property name <property name="namespace">lib1</property> is included.
EB: The report designer should generate and store the relative path when a library is included in the report design. The absolute path should be replaced with a relative path. The property name <property name="fileName"> should contain the relative path instead of the absolute path.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a report design in the BIRT designer.
2. Include a library from a location outside of the project directory by providing a relative path.
3. Save the report design.
4. Verify that the library include property <property name="fileName"> now contains the relative path and not the absolute path.
